metadata.name: Element Combinations Dataset
metadata.description: Advanced element combination analysis for complex BaZi chart interpretation and relationship dynamics
metadata.author: FatePath BaZi Master

fields.name: description
fields.example: Three elements forming a powerful combination

data.description: Three elements forming a powerful combination that creates natural harmony and flow. Wood generates Fire, Fire generates Earth, creating a cycle of growth and stability.
Four elements in balance create a harmonious and complete system. Each element supports and balances the others, creating stability and growth potential.
Opposing elements create dynamic tension that can lead to either conflict or powerful synergy. Water controls Fire, but Fire can also evaporate Water.
Hidden combinations occur when elements have indirect relationships. Wood and Metal don't directly interact but can create interesting dynamics through other elements.
Destructive cycle where Metal cuts Wood. This creates tension but can also lead to necessary change and transformation.

combinationRules.generation: Elements that generate each other create natural harmony
combinationRules.control: Elements that control each other create tension and change
combinationRules.hidden: Hidden combinations have subtle, indirect effects

interpretationGuidance.strong: Strong combinations provide powerful energy and clear direction
interpretationGuidance.moderate: Moderate combinations offer balanced energy with some challenges
interpretationGuidance.weak: Weak combinations provide subtle influence that requires careful attention
